metadata.title: CVE-2013-7343 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in flowplayer.swf in the Flashfallback feature in Flowplayer HTML5 5.4.3 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML by using URL encoding within thecallback parameter name.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2013-7342.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
